29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

470781.name: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster
470781.lore:
As a descendant bred personally by the Imperator Insectorum, its only desire is to expand the numbers of its kind. It uses giant scythes to harvest planets for its nest, tirelessly nurturing countless offspring, and devastating innumerable lives until the moment of its death.

"On the broken planet, giant locusts blotted out the sky, and swarms of insects poured out of the planet's crust. The stag beetle raised this new nest and presented it as a gift to its Imperator Insectorum... May this horror only exist in historical records, never to appear again."

549437.name: Thief's Instinct
549437.desc: A small amount of anti-matter. Crude material used for enhancement.
549437.lore:
A small amount of anti-matter that emanates out of the Voidranger: Reaver like the materialization of its destructive instinct.

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

589819.name: Celestial Section
589819.desc: Melodious section fallen from the heavens. Used to level up Traces moderately for Harmony characters.
589819.lore:
A musical section scattered from order. Falling silently from the edge of the heavens, it blends into the cacophony, like grains of sand scattered in the desert.

"No one notices it until it ignites a spark of inspiration..."

633378.name: Usurper's Scheme
633378.desc: A moderate amount of anti-matter. Normal material used for enhancement.
633378.lore:
A moderate amount of anti-matter that floats around the Voidranger: Distorter. The amount of matter and anti-matter particles has reached a dangerous balance...

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Antimatter Legion at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

673760.name: Heavenly Melody
673760.desc: Symphonic movements from the cosmos. Used to level up Traces significantly for Harmony characters.
673760.lore:
A piece of music scattered from order. It quietly echoes from beyond the heavens, drowned out by profound silence, like a lone star twinkling in a river of stars.

"No one feels it until it is forgotten by all ♬..."

717319.name: Conqueror's Will
717319.desc: Condensed anti-matter. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717319.lore:
Highly condensed anti-matter within the body of the Voidranger: Trampler. The moment of obliteration is the trumpet call for civilizations' destruction.

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Antimatter Legion at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

782692.name: Enigmatic Ectostella
782692.desc: A fathomless crystal. Ascension material for the Trailblazer.
782692.lore:
Severed from the highest of beings, this crystal reflects ever-changing mirages. The past and future intertwine on each of its countless facets, attempting to swallow up all observers.

"Civilization is but a thin sheet of ice on top of the deep dark ocean of chaos."

874346.name: Firmament Note
874346.desc: Scattered note from the firmament. Used to level up Traces slightly for Harmony characters.
874346.lore:
A musical note scattered from order. Falling silently from the edge of the clouds, it blends into the symphony of mortal sounds, like a tear dissolving into the sea.

"No one hears it until it dissolves into a song..."

ranks.name: Best Seat in the House
ranks.descHash: After using Skill for the first time, immediately recovers <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> Skill Point(s).

ranks.name: Jailbreaking Rainbowwalk
ranks.descHash: When the battle starts, the Trailblazer's Energy Regeneration Rate increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>, lasting for <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> turn(s).

ranks.name: Sanatorium for Rest Notes
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: Dove in Tophat
ranks.descHash: While the Trailblazer is on the field, increases the Break Effect of all teammates (excluding the Trailblazer), by an amount equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of the Trailblazer's Break Effect.

ranks.name: Poem Favors Rhythms of Old
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Tomorrow, Rest in Spotlight
ranks.descHash: The number of additional DMG applications by the Skill increases by <nobr>#1[i]</nobr>.

skills.descHash: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
skills.name: Swing Dance Etiquette

skills.descHash: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single target enemy and additionally deals DMG for 4 times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a random enemy.
skills.name: Halftime to Make It Rain

skills.descHash: Grants all allies the Backup Dancer effect, lasting for #1[i] turn(s). This duration reduces by 1 at the start of Trailblazer's every turn. Allies with the Backup Dancer effect have their Break Effect increased by #3[i]%. And when they attack enemy targets that are in the Weakness Broken state, the Toughness Reduction of the attack will be converted into 1 instance of Super Break DMG.
skills.name: All-Out Footlight Parade

skills.descHash: The Trailblazer immediately regenerates #1[f1] Energy when an enemy target's Weakness is Broken.
skills.name: Full-on Aerial Dance

skills.descHash: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash: After the Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, all allies' Break Effect increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>, lasting for <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> turn(s).
skills.name: Now! I'm the Band!

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When the number of enemy targets on the field is 5 (or more)/4/3/2/1, the Super Break DMG triggered by the Backup Dancer effect increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#4[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#5[i]%</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: Dance With the One

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When using Skill, additionally increases the Toughness Reduction of the first instance of DMG by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: Shuffle Along

embedBonusSkill.descHash: Additionally delays the enemy target's action by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> when allies Break enemy Weaknesses.
embedBonusSkill.name: Hat of the Theater

voiceItems.title: Memory: About Self
voiceItems.text: When there is the chance to make a choice, make one that you know you won't regret...
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "The Voyage Continues."

voiceItems.title: Memory: The Express
voiceItems.text: What kind of a life would I have lived if I didn't choose to board the Express... No, there is no such possibility.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "The Voyage Continues."

voiceItems.title: Memory: Pom-Pom
voiceItems.text: They may sound annoyed, but their body language is more honest. I should visit Pom-Pom more often.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Adventure Mission "The Conductor's Rewards."

voiceItems.title: Memory: Herta Space Station
voiceItems.text: My weapon is also one of the Curios of the space station. I don't know where it came from, but it must be important if it appeals to Madam Herta.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "The Voyage Continues."

voiceItems.title: Memory: Destruction
voiceItems.text: Just where did the will of Destruction come from? Was it really because of the Stellaron within me...?
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "The Voyage Continues."

voiceItems.title: Memory: Belobog
voiceItems.text: Just like me, the people of Belobog are also seeing the native sky of this planet for the first time.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing Trailblaze Mission "Silent Galaxy."

voiceItems.title: Memory: Preservation
voiceItems.text: The seed of Preservation has always been within Belobog, and I simply re-ignited this city's will to live... That will may be weak, but this was not the time for it to go out.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing Trailblaze Mission "Silent Galaxy."

voiceItems.title: Destruction Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: Choice isn't as elusive as it may appear.

voiceItems.title: Preservation Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: The value of choice lies in unwavering resolve.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after treading on a new Path

voiceItems.title: Preservation Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: Preservation is determined by our actions.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after treading on a new Path

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With March 7th
voiceItems.text: March, lead the counterattack. I believe in you.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: Dan Heng, let's make this quick.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae
voiceItems.text: Like always, Dan Heng, let's make this quick!

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Himeko
voiceItems.text: I'm counting on you to wrap this up, Himeko.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Welt
voiceItems.text: I'm on it, Wel—... Ahem, Mr. Yang.

voiceItems.title: Harmony Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: Unknown to each other, yet united in purpose, we make the same choices.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after treading on a new Path

voiceItems.title: Harmony Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: Before our paths diverge, savor the shared journey.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after treading on a new Path

voiceItems.title: Memory: Penacony
voiceItems.text: In Penacony, Mikhail has long spent his life embodying the precious legacy of the Watchmaker... Only when one wakes up can one bring the dreams of the night into the daylight.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "Stranger in a Strange Land"

voiceItems.title: Memory: The Harmony
voiceItems.text: I have had my fair share of strife and conflict with others, but I am willing to put that aside for now and look toward our shared future, where fortuitous destinies intersect.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "Stranger in a Strange Land"

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate (Destruction)
voiceItems.text: Rules are made to be broken!

voiceItems.title: Weakness Break (Preservation)
voiceItems.text: Time to go on the offensive.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after treading on a new Path.

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: Reach the end of the story in your own way.

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: It's still early. Where to now?

storyItems.title: About "You"
storyItems.text: A girl/boy, Trailblazer, decides to travel with the Astral Express to eliminate the threat of the Stellaron.
storyItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "The Voyage Continues."

storyItems.title: Your "Story": Part I
storyItems.text:
You don't remember much.
You're not from around here, nor did you come from elsewhere. You're not really going anywhere—
Just then, that indistinct voice whispers into your ear. That sorrowful and tender persuasion, that deceptive goading...
The seeds take root. You open your eyes, and the speaker is no longer there.

But there are more and more voices, and they are getting clearer and clearer.
Some give easygoing care, some calmly provide advice, some speak firm support, and some gift gentle direction...
You see the silken thread being woven to form tomorrow.

A huge beast descends from infinity,
golden pupils stare down from the darkness,
and you are no longer abandoned by the past.
You will also set upon a long journey,
and the thorns you have stepped on have become your path.

The train whistles, wishing you a successful journey to the coming future
...by your own will.
storyItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "The Voyage Continues."

storyItems.title: Your "Story": Part II
storyItems.text:
You have arrived at the "City of Preservation."
Behind the snow curtain, the wind lashes like steel blades, but the kindling burns on.
Distant lands won't hear them, and the earth trembles in kind, with only the wailing crowds braving the wind.

After facing foreign enemies, the Eternal Freeze, and reality's fissures, a rot begins to fester within the fort.
You try lending a helping hand, but are forsaken.
Some once looked down on you and misunderstood you, but still you stood by their side and helped them find their way.
More care about you and worry about you. They face their suffering, and find the cure for the distressed.
Eventually, they come to your side.

In the ice and snow, you are like a fire, protecting the soul of this world
...Even though you must scorch yourself day and night.
storyItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing Trailblaze Mission "Silent Galaxy."

storyItems.title: Your "Story": Part III
storyItems.text:
The harmonious music guides you to stumble into the sweet dream, as syrup and soda fill your throat.
The festival is grand, the crowd boisterous, and strangers cast on disguises to meet up in the dream.
You view to your hearts' desires the wondrous and otherworldly views, and part ways when dewdrops shimmer with the break of dawn —
When the pitch-black midnight has just begun.

The clock hands go tick-tock, and death follows closely like a shadow.
You are placed onto the table as a bargaining chip, but manage to win for yourself the right to uncover the secret.
You bring with you the dreams of the dead and continue on the road that they did not walk, facing the enemies they could not defeat—

The false god rises in the conglomeration of the multitude's wishes, and the unanimous song of the gazillions drowns out your existence.
Those walking on different roads take up each other's hands,
your melodies interweave with each other, faint but imperishable like the lights in a long night.
One after one, people startle awake from their dream. That tiny song finally merges into a deafening roar in the end, tearing free of the dream's curtains.

The eternal sweet dream scatters in a fleeting instant, and you finally understand why people slumber
— They do so towards a dawn freed from dreams.
storyItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "And on the Eighth Day"

name: Trailblazer
descHash: A girl/boy who boarded the Astral Express. They chose to travel with the Astral Express to eliminate the dangers posed by the Stellaron.
